articles.title: Rohit Bal: Pioneering Indian fashion designer dies at 63 - BBC.com
articles.description: Bal, whose innovative creations were worn by stars and supermodels, had recently made a comeback after years.
articles.content:
Bal's designs were marked by a deep understanding of Indian textiles
Rohit Bal, one of India's most celebrated fashion designers, has died aged 63 after a long period of illness.
The Fashion Design… [+5073 chars]
